Detailed Description

Class that models a button from the chisimba core modules.

It basically an interface class between the hosportal module and the chisimba core modules. This creates less dependancy on chisimba and increases flexibility and maintainability

Author:
Salman Noor
MIU Intern School of Electrical Engineering, WITS Unversity
Version:
0.68
Date:
May 3, 2010
Warning:
Do NOT pass variable types as parameters that are not specified in this class

Definition at line 54 of file editmessage_class_inc.php.

$objbuildform [private]

private data member of class editmessage

This class is composed of one object from the form_module class beloninging to the chisimba_modules_handler hierarchy. This form object lets you add numerous different types of objects and fields. Once you have inputted all the data required in those objects. You can set this form to be submitted. Once submitted, all the inputted data is converted into parameters in which you can use the string query function getParam(variable to be stored,parameter) to do what you like with them in other entities.

Definition at line 49 of file editmessage_class_inc.php.

$objDBComment [private]

private data member of class editmessage

This class is composed of one object from the dbhosportal_messages class beloninging to the chisimba_modules_handler hierarchy. This object provides functions to insert, sort, edit and delete entries in the database.

$objouputtext [private]

private data member of class editmessage

This class is composed of one object from the language_module class beloninging to the chisimba_modules_handler hierarchy. This object lets you output text from text elements from the register.conf file.
